column6: wɔnsɔr mbisa na wɔnda ase mma nyimpa nyina;"

column2: "ahemfo nye hɔn a wodzi tum nyina: ama yaatsena ase dwudwoodwo
column3: komm wɔ nyamesompa nye fɔntɔmmyɛ nyina mu."

column2: "Iyi na oye na ɔyɛ enyisɔ wɔ hɛn Agyenkwa Nyankopɔn enyim;"
"ɔno a ɔpɛ dɛ wɔgye nyimpa nyina nkwa
column3: na wɔba nokwar no no ho nyimdzee mu."
na Nyankopɔn nye nyimpa ntamugyinafo so kortsee
column4: Kraest Jesus a ɔnoara so yɛ nyimpa no a."

column2: "Ɔno a ɔdze noho maa dɛ apondze maa nyimpa nyina; dɛ ɔnyɛ dase wɔ ber a ɔsɛ mu;"
"no ho na wɔahyɛ me ɔsɛnkafo nye ɔsomafo
column5: amanaman kyerɛkyerɛfo wɔ gyedzi nye nokwar mu."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi mepɛ dɛ mbarimba yɛ asɔr wɔ mbea nyina
column3: wɔma nsa krɔnkrɔn a ebufuw anaa anyanyan nnyi mu do."

column2: "Dɛmara so na mbaa nhyɛ ntar a ɔkyerɛ dɛ wɔfɛr adze na hɔn enyi ka famu
column6: anaa ahondze pa anaa aboɔdzen ntar nnsiesie hɔn ho;"

column3: dɛ mbrɛ ɔsɛ mbaa a woyi nyamesom kyerɛ no
column4: wɔmfa ndwuma pa nyɛ hɔn ahosiesie."

column2: "Wɔmma ɔbaa nyɛ komm nsua wɔ ahobrɛadze nyina mu."
"Na wodzii kan bɔɔ Adam ansaana wɔrobɔ Eve;"

column3: na ɔbaa no na wɔdaadaa no a ɔkɔtɔɔ mbrato mu;"

column2: "naaso sɛ ɔdze enyidahɔ tsena gyedzi nye dɔ nye ahotsew mu a
